EmailTemplate.subject: Never Miss a Moment – Stay Connected in the Sky ✈️
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/JetWave_Owner.html]]> Traveling no longer means missing out on life’s little moments or the the big game…as long as your business jet is powered by JetWave™. Jet ConneX, a hi-speed, in-flight Wi-Fi service that is powered by our JetWave, lets passengers stay connected from the moment they walk on the plane. No matter how far you fly, the global coverage travels with the plane, ensuring the same consistent connectivity experience in the air as on the ground -- so you won’t miss a moment in life. The JetWave satellite communication system is available and is certified on virtually all super mid-size and larger business jets. Find out what 500+ other business jet owners have discovered by leveraging the power of connected.
Don’t miss out on new reduced pricing through the end of 2019. Connect with us now for a quote.
CONNECT WITH OUR TEAM <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/JetWave_Owner.html]]>
